thread.section_title: Luxy Hair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Luxy Hair | www.luxyhair.com
thread.title: Joanna Hernandez
thread.title_full: Luxy Hair reviewed by Joanna Hernandez

author: Joanna Hernandez
title: Joanna Hernandez
text: Luxy Hair is hands down the best hair on the market ! I've tried several different brands including well know Ones such as Bellami , and they just don't compare . Luxy hair is so thick and luxurious ,super shiny ,and will last as long as u take good care of them. These don't shed and are so thick you don't even have to use all the wefts. I'd love to have these In every color because they are just that great. I will forever buy luxy hair !!
